rusty_sword.name: Rusty sword
rusty_sword.description: A notched and stained blade, but the edge is keen.

steel_sword.name: Steel sword
steel_sword.description: A well-forged blade of good steel.

shortsword.name: Shortsword
shortsword.description: A light blade, quick to draw.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: A knight's weapon. Balanced and deadly.

woodsmans_axe.name: Woodsman's axe
woodsmans_axe.description: A heavy axe meant for trees, but effective against men.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.description: A mechanical bow. Slow to reload but powerful.
